Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
public class Room extends Object
Class Room - represents a location in the game. A Room is a specific location in the game's map. Each room has a description and can be connected to other rooms in various directions.
Author:
Florian NELCHA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Room(String pD)
    Constructor to initialize the room with a description, and a HashMap with its exits.

    Creates a keySet of all the exits from the current room, then constructs a string of it.
    String
    getLongDescription()
    Returns a description of the current room, of the form : You are in the Control Room.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String pD)
      Constructor to initialize the room with a description, and a HashMap with its exits.
      Parameters:
      pD - Description of the room.

  • Method Details

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Gets the description of the room.
      Returns:
      Description of the room.

    • getExit

      public Room getExit(String pDirection)
      Gets the room in the specified direction if it exists.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction in which to look for an exit.
      Returns:
      The neighboring room in the specified direction, or null if it doesn't exist.

    • getExitString

      public String getExitString()
      Creates a keySet of all the exits from the current room, then constructs a string of it.
      Returns:
      A string with all available exit directions.

    • getLongDescription

      public String getLongDescription()
      Returns a description of the current room, of the form : You are in the Control Room. Exits : south
      Returns:
      A description of the room, and its exits

    • setExits

      public void setExits(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor)
      Sets an exit for the specified direction to a neighboring room.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - Direction of the exit.
      pNeighbor - The neighboring room in that direction.
